0.name: Mandarin Teacher
0.description: I taught Mandarin to 5th and 6th grade students in two different basic schools in Braga, André Soares and Lamaçães. I had the opportunity to work both remotely and face-to-face.

1.name: Intern
1.description: Restoration and customer service. I Worked under pressure in rotating shifts and positions. Worked selling tickets and refreshments, controlling access to the theatre, and maintaining rigorous hygiene protocols.

2.name: Health and Safety Agent
2.description: First worked at a municipal pool. Here I helped to maintain order and safety, assisting customers and lifeguards. Then moved to the Transport Coordinator Centre where I worked as a nightguard and assistance to night shift drivers.

0.name: Major in Chinese Language

1.name: Degree in Oriental Studies
1.description: Here I aquired the basis of both Chinese and Japanese language and knowledge about their respective cultural, social and economic reality. As a class delegate for three years I represented the best interests of my classmates and established a bridge between teachers and students.

2.name: Masters in Communication, Art and Culture
2.description: Here I mastered the close interconnection between the media, politics and society, whilst understanding the importance of art as a human manifestation of communication.

3.name: Degree in Cultural Studies
3.description: Here I studied different aspects of the contemporary civilization (science, technology, digital), developed an analytical attitude capable of understanding the complexity of cultural practices

0.name: UX/UI Design
0.description: Here I am studying techniques to research, investigate and evaluate user requirements and how to deliver exceptional and intuitive designs.

1.name: Programming Languages - Web
1.description: Here I learned the fundamentals of software engeneering, how to structure projects, write algorithms, basic C, and intermediate level JS, HTML5 and CSS3.

2.name: Front End Development Libraries
2.description: An introduction to Redux, Bootstrap, Sass and Scss.

3.name: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
3.description: Here I deepened my knowledge in Object Oriented Programming and Functional Programming.

4.name: Responsive Web Design
4.description: Here I deepened my knowledge in HTML5 and CSS3.

5.name: Complete JavaScript Course
5.description: Here I deepened my understanding of JavaScript and applied my skills on personal projects.
